sentence.Network_en: A variety of heavy industries grew up alongside the port.

sentence.Network_en: Daisy strode alongside her, breathing heavily but keeping pace.

sentence.Network_cn: 他穿过街道，沿着中央公园走。

entry.tran: 在…旁边；沿着…的边；与…并排靠拢
entry.def: If one thing is alongside another thing, the first thing is next to the second.

example.ex: He crossed the street and walked alongside Central Park...
example.tran: 他穿过街道，沿着中央公园走。

example.ex: Much of the industry was located alongside rivers.

entry.def: If you work alongside other people, you all work together in the same place.

example.ex: He had worked alongside Frank and Mark and they had become friends...
example.tran: 他与弗兰克和马克一起工作过，并且成了朋友。

example.ex: Men aged 60 are fighting alongside young boys.
example.tran: 年届六十的男人们和少年小伙们并肩作战。

entry.def: If one thing exists or develops alongside another, the two things exist or develop together at the same time.

example.ex: Her self-confidence will develop alongside her technique...
example.tran: 随着她的技术不断提高，她会愈发自信。

example.ex: Alongside the Job Creation Programme they launched a Work Experience Programme.
example.tran: 在开展创造就业项目的同时，他们还启动了工作经历项目。

Sentence.sentence: Bell peppers stuffed with couscous, alongside ratatouille, is a very popular dish.
The findings of the study so against received wisdom that boys do better when taught alongside girls.

sentences.en: The two ships lay alongside of each other.
There was a butcher's shop alongside the theatre.
Put this cloth alongside real silk, and you will at once see the difference.
sentences.cn: 把这块料子同真丝放在一起比较, 你就会立刻看出差别。

sentences.en: It's a pleasure to work alongside such men.
sentences.cn: 与这样的人一起工作是一件乐事。

It's a pleasure to work alongside such men.
